## Rules

<!-- This file was automatically generated -->

## `ban-allow-all`

- **Description**: Disallows the use of `--allow-all`.
- **Tags**: recommended, security, permissions

## `require-allow-list`

- **Description**: Enforces that `--allow-*` flag to have an allow list.
- **Tags**: recommended, security, permissions

## `require-lockfile`

- **Description**: Enforces that a lockfile to be enabled.
- **Tags**: recommended, security

## `require-minimum-dependency-age`

- **Description**: Enforces that `minimumDependencyAge` to be configured.
- **Tags**: recommended, security
